when the flagship returns from Europe.
Only one mission may be held at a time.

mission.royal.shipyard_wood.name: Timber for the Shipyards
mission.royal.shipyard_wood.desc: By royal will I command that a great store of timber be gathered forthwith for the building of ships and seaâ€‘works. The Crownâ€™s yards shall labour day and night, and lack of stock I shall count as neglect against the realm. Deliver the timber in full measure, that the fleet may put to sea without delay.
mission.royal.army_food.name: Victuals for the Army
mission.royal.army_food.desc: I order that our hosts be supplied with food, so that no soldier suffer hunger in service. Moreover you shall provide hides for harness and the mending of gear, that the army remain ready. Let the stores arrive in time, for upon them depend the strength of march and victory in the field.
mission.royal.cannons_iron.name: Iron for the Cannon
mission.royal.cannons_iron.desc: I charge and command that iron be prepared for the casting of guns and the repair of the arsenal. Fortresses and ships must bear sure arms, and the royal forges may not stand idle. Delay not the delivery, for upon it rests the safety of the borders and the glory of our host.
mission.royal.fleet_steel.name: Steel for the Fleet
mission.royal.fleet_steel.desc: Let steel be delivered for fittings, anchors, and the armament of the fleet, and timber for masts and hulls. This command takes precedence over all other affairs, for the seas brook strength and order. Fulfil your duty without excuse, that our banners may rule the trade routes.
mission.royal.court_sugar.name: Sugar for the Court
mission.royal.court_sugar.desc: I order that sugar in due quantity be brought to the royal pantries. My court must be worthily served at feasts and embassies, for the splendour of the table betokens the might of the Crown. Let the delivery be pure and full, without lowering of measure.
mission.royal.gift_for_king.name: A Gift for the King
mission.royal.gift_for_king.desc: I command that gifts fit for majesty be prepared: gold and silver for the treasury, and cigars for the use of court and honoured guests. Let visiting envoys behold that the kingdom stands in plenty and lacks no splendour. Deliver all without shortfall and in seemly state.
mission.royal.treasury_gold.name: Gold for the Treasury
mission.royal.treasury_gold.desc: I order the royal treasury to be replenished with gold, that the realm may conduct war and peace according to our will. Coin must flow to the coffers without delay, for upon it rest order and law. He who lingers in delivery harms the Crown.
mission.royal.army_support.name: Support for the Army
mission.royal.army_support.desc: You shall set aside steel for arms, cuirasses, and the repair of gear, and cloth for the raiment of troops in the field. I command this be done at once, that the army lose neither heart nor readiness. Let every soldier wear the Kingâ€™s colours with pride and stand prepared to march.
mission.royal.disease_relief.name: Relief Against Sickness
mission.royal.disease_relief.desc: I command that herbs and medicaments be gathered, that plague and illness not waste our folk. The royal physicians must receive means of healing at once, for the health of subjects is the strength of the state. Let the delivery be honest and the quality spotless.
mission.royal.church_support.name: Support of the Church
mission.royal.church_support.desc: I order that gold and silver be given for the needs of temples, and food for the orders and almsâ€‘houses under the Churchâ€™s care. Faith and spiritual order uphold the throne; who scorns this command resists the realmâ€™s peace. Execute it without delay.
mission.native.bison_hunt_help.name: Aid in the Bison Hunt
mission.native.bison_hunt_help.desc: The great herds of bison wander away from our lands. Give us meat and hides, that our women and children do not starve this winter before the white hunters take all.
mission.native.ancestors_hungry.name: The Ancestorsâ€™ Spirits Hunger
mission.native.ancestors_hungry.desc: The spirits of our fathers roam uneasy. Bring sweet crystals, fragrant smoke, and meat to gladden them by the fire. Then they shall guard you too, paleâ€‘face.
mission.native.northerners_burn_villages: Men in blue coats burn our tipis and slay our horses. Give us iron and steel to make spears and axes worthy of warriors. Together we shall drive off those dogs.
mission.native.shaman_needs_herbs.name: The Shaman Needs Herbs
mission.native.shaman_needs_herbs.desc: The Old Shaman dreamt of sacred herbs that grow only where the whites dig yellow stones. Bring them quickly, for spirits of sickness circle our children.
mission.native.women_want_fabrics.name: Women Desire Fine Cloth from Paleâ€‘Faces
mission.native.women_want_fabrics.desc: Our squaws heard of soft, bright cloth worn by women from great boats. Bring it, and our women will sing of you by the fire.
mission.native.stolen_chief_horse.name: The Chiefâ€™s Horse Was Stolen
mission.native.stolen_chief_horse.desc: Distant cousins from the south stole the finest stallion of the Great Chief. We must forge new shoes and lances. Give us iron; when we regain our horses, we shall share the spoils of pale settlers with you.
mission.native.great_spirit_shiny_stones: The Great Spirit Craves Shining Stones
In dream the Great Spirit showed us bright stones from your chests. Bring them as a gift, and we will show you paths where the earth yields moreâ€”before other paleâ€‘faces take all.
mission.native.sun_dance_feast.name: Rum and Sugar for the Sunâ€‘Dance Feast
mission.native.sun_dance_feast.desc: In three moons there will be a great feast of the Sun Dance. We need sweet fire from cane and much food. Bring itâ€”we shall dance and pray also for your settlement.
mission.native.children_sick.name: The Children Are Sick
mission.native.children_sick.desc: Black pox came with your ships and takes our children. We hear you have bitter waters that heal. Give them swiftly, else spirits of vengeance will come to your huts as well.
mission.native.trade.name: Trade
mission.native.trade.desc: We have the finest beaver and fox furs on the whole coast. But first prove you are not like other paleâ€‘faces who steal and lie. Bring giftsâ€”then we shall open our storehouses.
mission.native.prairie_drought.name: Drought on the Prairies
mission.native.prairie_drought.desc: The sun has drunk the rivers dry, and the grass is yellow as old bones. Our children cry with hunger. Give us meat and herbs that we may endure until the rains return.
mission.native.warriors_return.name: Warriors Return from the Trail
mission.native.warriors_return.desc: Our warriors come back from a far path. We must greet them with food and fragrant smoke, that the spirits see the tribe is strong. Bring gifts, and you will hear songs of bravery.
mission.native.palisade_repair.name: Repair of the Village Palisade
mission.native.palisade_repair.desc: Wolves and men from the north prowl near our lodges. Our palisade has rotted. Give us timber and iron for blades, and the foe shall not enter our homes.
mission.native.new_tipis_for_winter.name: New Tipis for Winter
mission.native.new_tipis_for_winter.desc: Winter will be long and hard. We need hides for new tipis and warm cloth for the women. Bring them, and our fires shall burn also for you.
mission.native.new_chief_naming_feast.na: Feast for Naming a New Chief
mission.native.new_chief_naming_feast.de: The old Chief has gone beyond the river of spirits. The new one must receive gifts, that his word be strong. Bring shining stones and smokeâ€”then you will be friend to our clan.
mission.native.horses_need_shoes.name: The Horses Need Shoes
mission.native.horses_need_shoes.desc: Our horses are swift as wind, but their hooves chip on stone. Give us steel and iron for shoes, and our scouts will guard your borders.
mission.native.lost_hunters.name: Lost Hunters
mission.native.lost_hunters.desc: Three young hunters have not returned from the forest. We fear a bear mauled them or they lost their way in fog. Give us food and bitter medicines to seek and heal them.
mission.native.silver_for_ancestors_grav: We wish to raise a ring of stones for our forebears, that their spirits may rest. Give us silver and sacred herbs, and their blessing will fall upon your settlement too.
mission.native.traders_cheated_elders.de: Other paleâ€‘faces gave us old rags and false promises. Show that you are different. Bring true cloth and silver coins, and you will win back our trust.
mission.native.sacred_grove_fire.name: Fire in the Sacred Grove
mission.native.sacred_grove_fire.desc: In the sacred grove there is not enough wood for the fires that drive off evil spirits. We also need meat and smoke for prayers. Bring it, and the Shaman will speak good words over you.
